body.p: {{tp21|Your task is to fill in the empty boxes within the text. You are given a list of items with different properties as described below:}}

ol.li: {{tli45|after filling in to the text, the item in the menu is deactivated}}
{{tli46|after filling in, the item in the list is not deactivated and can be used again}}
{{tli47|Click on the empty gap - a menu with items appears}}
{{tli48|Click a selected item. It will be filled in to the gap.}}

body.p: {{tp23|To change the filled in item, fill in another one into its place.}}
